A1: two single lanes separated by medians
RelatedSentence: As they approach Eufaula , the four - lane highway divides into two single lanes separated by medians 30 to 50 feet wide .
The medians are filled with crepe myrtles , azaleas and giant live oaks that create a canopy with the huge oaks in front of mansions from the 1800s .
Those mansions anchor a historic district with nearly 700 buildings .
The street is also the busiest two - lane stretch of road in Alabama , averaging 21,000 vehicles a day , Cooper said .
Mayor Jack Tibbs said traffic backs up on busy weekends for beach tourism , but the town uses police officers to keep the vehicles moving .
